content: way through the purple is substituted for yellow in the tail and row 15 only chain 13 slip_stitch in second chain from the hook and single_crochet in every chain back to the beginning excluding the last chain in that last stitch change the plain purple to plain yellow place a stitch marker or use a piece of yarn to mark the end of the tail this pattern begins with the tail but if you find the start difficult you can easily substitute a magic_ring with 6 single_crochet and begin from there when you have completed a few row just tie in your tail after row 1 single_crochet 6 into the last stitch 6 stitches if you crochet over two strands of the starting chain it makes a smaller hole these 6 single_crochet s are the start of the pig s rump continue with row 2 without joining the tail needs to be bent towards you so the first single_crochet of row 2 will need to be behind the tail row 2 *increase in every single_crochet* repeat around 12 stitches row 3 *increase in next single_crochet single_crochet 1* repeat around 18 stitches row 4 *increase in next single_crochet single_crochet 2* repeat around 24 stitches row 5 single_crochet 24 24 stitches row 6 single_crochet 12 5 double_crochet bobble stitch in next stitch single_crochet 5 5 double_crochet bobble stitch in next stitch single_crochet 2 increase in next single_crochet single_crochet 2 25 stitches make sure that each bobble stitch is pressed to the outside of the pig the next few row help create a rounded back to the pig the increases and decreases are only on the top half of the work row 7 *increase in next single_crochet single_crochet 2* four times single_crochet 13 29 stitches row 8 - 11 single_crochet 29 29 stitches criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-party-pig row 12 single_crochet 27 decrease 28 stitches row 13 *single_crochet 2 decrease* 4 times then single_crochet 12 24 stitches row 14 *decrease single_crochet 4* repeat around 20 stitches row 15 complete the first single_crochet in yellow but change the plain colour from yellow to purple for the ear single_crochet 1 this next stitch is the first ear in the front loop only complete all stitches in brackets chain 1 1hdc 1dc 1tr 3 chain then slip_stitch into the back of the first chain picot made 2tr 1dc 1hdc chain 1 change back to yellow here single_crochet 5 change back to purple here in the front loop only chain 1 1 half_double_crochet 1dc 2tr 3 chain then slip_stitch into the back of the first chain picot made 1tr 1dc 1hdc chain 1 change back to yellow here single_crochet 4 5 double_crochet bobble stitch in next stitch single_crochet 3 5 double_crochet bobble stitch in next stitch single_crochet 3 20 stitches summary of row 15 single_crochet 1 purple ear single_crochet 5 purple ear single_crochet 4 foot single_crochet 3 foot single_crochet 3 = 20 stitches row 16 single_crochet 1 skip back stitch single_crochet 5 skip back stitch single_crochet
